data.eml:eml: Four new species of the genus Thoracophorus Motschulsky, 1857 for the Neotropical region (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Osoriinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Irmler, Ulrich (2015): Four new species of the genus Thoracophorus Motschulsky, 1857 for the Neotropical region (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Osoriinae). Zootaxa 4039 (3): 431-444, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4039.3.3
